page.name: True Mortal
page.description: <no description available>

page.name: Abyssal Silver Hammer IV
page.description: This hammer was forged and wielded by True Mortal several years ago when an uprising of Yokai occurred on Sho'Nuff. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

properties.name: Abyssal Silver Hammer IV
properties.description: This hammer was forged and wielded by True Mortal several years ago when an uprising of Yokai occurred on Sho'Nuff. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: Abyssal Silver Katana IV
page.description: When True Mortal forged the silver hammer he also forged this katana for a friend to use in battle against the Yokai. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

properties.name: Abyssal Silver Katana IV
properties.description: When True Mortal forged the silver hammer he also forged this katana for a friend to use in battle against the Yokai. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: Abyssal Silver Wakizashi IV
page.description:
These short swords, forged by True Mortal during the uprising on Sho'Nuff are perfectly balanced for
dual wielding. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

properties.name: Abyssal Silver Wakizashi IV
properties.description:
These short swords, forged by True Mortal during the uprising on Sho'Nuff are perfectly balanced for
dual wielding. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: Abyssal Silver Zanbato IV
page.description: This Zanbato was forged by True Mortal to be used during the Yokai uprising on Sho'Nuff. The blade may look oversized, but the balance is superb. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

properties.name: Abyssal Silver Zanbato IV
properties.description: This Zanbato was forged by True Mortal to be used during the Yokai uprising on Sho'Nuff. The blade may look oversized, but the balance is superb. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: Doom Hammer IV
page.description: This hammer follows the basic styling of the Abyssal Silver hammer but instead is forged from meteor iron, and imbued with the powers of darkness. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

properties.name: Doom Hammer IV
properties.description: This hammer follows the basic styling of the Abyssal Silver hammer but instead is forged from meteor iron, and imbued with the powers of darkness. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: War Wolf Cape IV
page.description:
This shimmering cape appears to be the pelt of a wolf, but closer examination reveals it to be finely
crafted metal fur made through a secret process.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

properties.name: War Wolf Cape IV
properties.description:
This shimmering cape appears to be the pelt of a wolf, but closer examination reveals it to be finely
crafted metal fur made through a secret process.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: Doom Wolf Cape IV
page.description:
As with the helm, True Mortal sent the early prototype of this cape to a friend for testing. When it was returned, it had been corrupted by darkness.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

properties.name: Doom Wolf Cape IV
properties.description:
As with the helm, True Mortal sent the early prototype of this cape to a friend for testing. When it was returned, it had been corrupted by darkness.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: War Wolf Helm IV
page.description:
As with the cape, this appears to be covered in the fur of a wolf, but closer inspection reveals it to be a clever creation of fur from metal, forged by True Mortal, Master Smith.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

properties.name: War Wolf Helm IV
properties.description:
As with the cape, this appears to be covered in the fur of a wolf, but closer inspection reveals it to be a clever creation of fur from metal, forged by True Mortal, Master Smith.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: Doom Wolf Helm IV
page.description:
When True Mortal first tried the technique he used in forging the War Wolf helm, he sent the helm to
a friend to test it out. When the wolf helm came back it had been corrupted by darkness.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

properties.name: Doom Wolf Helm IV
properties.description:

This item requires a Dragon Amulet.
